name: seat
description: A place to sit, or sleep if you're desperate.

name: reclining seat
description: A place to sit, and the backrest reclines to make it an uncomfortable bed.

name: tracking device
description: A small transmitter that lets you locate the vehicle on the map.

name: saddle
description: A padded wedge that you straddle, like a bicycle or motorcycle.

name: foldable seat
description: A crude seat, too uncomfortable to sleep in.

name: bed
description: A small but comfortable bed.

name: handle
description: A pair of handles.  You can mount other items on top of it.

name: wooden handle
description: A pair of handles.  You can mount other items on top of it.

name: light wooden handle
description: A pair of handles.  You can mount other items on top of it.

name: aisle
description: An aisle.

name: aisle
description: An aisle.

name: wooden aisle
description: An aisle.

name: wooden aisle
description: An aisle.

name: floor trunk
description: An aisle.  A hatch lets you access a cargo space beneath it.

name: cloth roof
description: A cloth roof.

name: roof
description: A metal roof.

name: heavy duty roof
description: A thick metal roof.

name: door
description: A door.  Has a window so you can see out of it, even when closed.

name: opaque door
description: A door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: heavy duty door
description: A strong door.  Has a window so you can see out of it, even when closed.

name: heavy duty opaque door
description: A strong door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: internal door
description: An interior door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: hatch
description: A strong door.  A window lets you see through it when closed.

name: opaque hatch
description: A strong door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: heavy duty hatch
description: A very strong door.  A window lets you see through it when closed.

name: opaque heavy duty hatch
description: A very strong door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: windshield
description: A sheet of glass that lets you see outside the vehicle.

name: blade
description: A blade, welded to the vehicle, for cutting up zombies.

name: blade
description: A blade, welded to the vehicle, for cutting up zombies.

name: spike
description: A metal spike, welded to the vehicle, to increase injury when crashing into things.

name: swappable storage battery case
description: A battery case for storage batteries.  Allows quick removal or addition of a storage battery, if you can lift the battery.

name: minireactor
description: A small nuclear reactor.  When loaded with plutonium cells and turned on, will generate a lot of electrical power.
//: Here it is a multiplier on power efficiency - 1 unit of plutonium is 100 units of battery

name: minifridge
description: A small fridge.  When turned on, it will cool the food inside, extended the time until the food spoils.

name: washing machine
description: A small washing machine.  With detergent or soap, water, and some electrical power, you could clean a lot of clothes.  'e'xamine the tile with the washing machine to use it.

name: controls
description: A steering wheel and accelerator and brake pedals.

name: dashboard
description: A frame containing some lights and controls.

name: electronics control unit
description: Some switches and knobs to control the vehicle's electrical systems.

name: muffler
description: A metal pipe that reduces some of noise of the engine.

name: seatbelt
description: A belt, attached to a seat.

name: security system
description: A bunch of electronics that make it difficult to start the vehicle without the proper key, and that will sound an alarm if you try.  The alarm can be disabled.

name: 5-point harness
description: A series of straps attached to the seat, intended to fasten together after going over your shoulders and hips and between your legs.

name: curtain
description: A sheet over a window.

name: aisle curtain
description: A sheet across an aisle.

name: solar panel
description: A solar panel.  Will slowly recharge the vehicle's electrical power when exposed to the sun.  Clouds will slow the recharge speed even more.

name: reinforced solar panel
description: A solar panel.  Will slowly recharge the vehicle's electrical power when exposed to the sun.  Clouds will slow the recharge speed even more.  Reinforced with armored glass to make it more resistant to damage.

name: upgraded solar panel
description: A high performance solar panel.  Will slowly recharge the vehicle's electrical power when exposed to the sun.  Clouds will slow the recharge speed even more.

name: upgraded reinforced solar panel
description: A high performance solar panel.  Will slowly recharge the vehicle's electrical power when exposed to the sun.  Clouds will slow the recharge speed even more.  Reinforced with armored glass to make it more resistant to damage.

name: quantum solar panel
description: An extremely high performance solar panel.  Will recharge the vehicle's electrical power when exposed to the sun.  Clouds will slow the recharge speed.  Extremely fragile and cannot be armored.

name: water faucet
description: A water faucet.

name: kitchen unit
description: A small but complete kitchen unit, powered from the vehicle's batteries.

name: welding rig
description: A welding rig mounted in the vehicle, that draws power from the vehicle's batteries.  You still need glare protection.  'e'xamine the tile with the rig to use it to repair items in your inventory.  If you attempt to craft an item or perform a repair that requires a welder, you will be given the option of using the welding rig.

name: FOODCO kitchen buddy
description: A multi-function crafting station, with a water purifier, food dehydrator, vacuum sealer, and hand press for making ammo.  Draws power from the vehicle's batteries.  'e'xamine the tile with the kitchen buddy to access the water faucet or to purify water in a vehicle tank or in a container in your inventory.  If you attempt craft an item that needs one of the kitchen buddy's functions, it will automically be selected as a tool.

name: onboard chemistry lab
description: A small chemistry station, including a hotplate powered by the vehicle's batteries.  'e'xamine the tile with the chemistry lab to access the water faucet or to heat up food with the hotplate.  If you attempt craft an item that needs one of the chemistry lab's functions, it will automically be selected as a tool.

name: mounted electric forge
description: A electric forge for metalworking, powered by the vehicle's batteries.  With a hammer and other tools, you could use this for metalworking.  If you attempt craft an item that needs a forge, you will be given the option of selecting it as a tool.

name: mounted electric kiln
description: A electric kiln for baking brick or clay, powered by the vehicle's batteries.  You could use this to harden bricks or clay.  If you attempt craft an item that needs a kiln, you will be given the option of selecting it as a tool.

name: spiked plating
description: A spiked plate that will increase the damage delivered to someone else in collisions.

name: reinforced windshield
description: A sheet of glass that lets you see outside the vehicle.  Reinforced with wire to make it harder to break than normal glass.

name: bicycle horn
description: A small horn.  Use the vehicle controls and select the honk option to make noise.

name: car horn
description: A horn.  Use the vehicle controls and select the honk option to make noise.

name: truck horn
description: A powerful truck horn.  Use the vehicle controls and select the honk option to make noise.

name: back-up beeper
description: An electronic noise maker.  It will automatically make noise when you drive in reverse, alerting things behind you to move out of the way.

name: trunk door
description: A short door.  You can always see over it, open or closed.

name: heavy duty trunk door
description: A strong, short door.  You can always see over it, open or closed.

name: shutter door
description: A strong door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: sliding door
description: A door.  A window lets you see through it when closed.

name: livestock stall
description: A cargo space for carrrying animals.  'e'xamine it it to capture an animal next to you, or to release the animal currently contained.  When selecting an animal to capture, choose its tile relative to you, not the part.

name: UPS-compatible recharging station
description: A recharger for UPS devices.  When turned on, it charges any UPS devices in the cargo space.

name: wing mirror
description: A small mirror, mounted outside the vehicle.  If you see the mirror, your vision is expanded as though you were standing where the mirror is.

name: inboard mirror
description: A small mirror, mounted inside the vehicle.  If you see the mirror, your vision is expanded as though you were standing where the mirror is.

name: stereo system
description: A stereo system.  When turned on, it plays music, improving your mood.

name: chimes
description: A collection of electronic bells.  Use the vehicle's controls to turn it on or off.  When turned on, it makes noise, attracting neighborhood children.

name: jumper cable
//: Epower for POWER_TRANSFER stuff is how much percentage-wise loss there is in transmission
description: Thick copper cable with leads on either end.  Attach one end to one vehicle and the other to another, and you can transfer electrical power between the two.

name: heavy-duty cable
description: Very thick copper cable with leads on either end.  Attach one end to one vehicle and the other to another, and you can transfer electrical power between the two.
//: Epower for POWER_TRANSFER stuff is how much percentage-wise loss there is in transmission

name: shiny cable
//: Epower for POWER_TRANSFER stuff is how much percentage-wise loss there is in transmission

name: wooden seat
description: A place to sit.

name: wooden spike
description: A wooden spike, attached to the vehicle, to increase injury when crashing into things.

name: wooden door
description: A door.  Has a window so you can see out of it, even when closed.

name: opaque wooden door
description: A door.  Solid construction means you can't see through it when closed.

name: wooden roof
description: A wooden roof.

name: door motor
description: A small electric motor.  Installed on the same frame as a door or curtain, it will allow you to remotely open the door or curtain from the vehicle controls.

name: drive by wire controls
description: A sophisticated set of electronic controls that allow you to control the vehicle from a vehicle remote while you are not in it.  You can 'e'xamine the tile or attempt to pick-up items (default ',') to access the controls, or use the vehicle control key (default '^').

name: camera control system
description: An LCD display attached to one or more cameras.  When turned on, it lets you see from the cameras, but drains power from the vehicle's batteries.  You can 'e'xamine the tile or attempt to pick-up items (default ',') to access the controls, or use the vehicle control key (default '^').

name: security camera
description: A small camera.  Will relay what it can see to a camera control station.

name: robot controls
description: A set of controls to allow a vehicle to drive itself, or you to drive it remotely using a controller.

name: clock
description: A clock, so you know what time it is.

name: leather funnel
description: A funnel that will collect rainwater into the tank beneath it.

name: makeshift funnel
description: A funnel that will collect rainwater into the tank beneath it.

name: funnel
description: A funnel that will collect rainwater into the tank beneath it.

name: metal funnel
description: A funnel that will collect rainwater into the tank beneath it.

name: scoop
description: A scoop.  Use the vehicle controls to turn it on or off.  When turned on, it will scoop up any loose items that it travels over, putting them into the vehicle's storage.

name: water purifier
description: A water purifier, powered by the vehicle's batteries.  You can use it to purify water in a container or in the vehicle's tanks.  'e'xamine the tile with the purifier to use it.

name: plow
description: A plow.  Use the vehicle controls to turn it on or off.  When turned on, it will create a furrow in any dirt it travels over, making it suitable for planting seeds.  It should be placed in front of any seed drills on the vehicle.

name: seed drill
description: A seed drill.  Use the vehicle controls to turn it on or off.  You can load it with seeds by examining it.  When turned on, it will drop seeds as the vehicle moves, or plant them in furrowed dirt.  It should be placed behind any plows on the vehicle, and any wheels should be placed so they won't run over the plants.

name: advanced seed drill
description: A seed drill.  Use the vehicle controls to turn it on or off.  You can load it with seeds by examining it.  When turned on, it will drop seeds as the vehicle moves, or plant them in furrowed dirt.  It should be placed behind any plows on the vehicle, and any wheels should be placed so they won't run over the plants.

name: reaper
description: An automatic reaper.  Use the vehicle controls to turn it on or off.  When on, it will cut down plants that it travels over.  It should be placed in front of any plows in the vehicle for efficient operation.  It does not include cargo space of its own so you need install a cargo space of some kind elsewhere in the vehicle.

name: advanced reaper
description: An automatic reaper.  Use the vehicle controls to turn it on or off.  When turned on, it will stop the vehicle unless it has a strong engine.  When on, it will cut down plants and store them in the vehicle's cargo.  It should be placed in front of any plows in the vehicle for efficient operation.  It has internal cargo space for collecting the harvest.

name: cargo lock
description: A set of locks.  Attached to a suitable cargo space, it will prevent other people from accessing the cargo and taking your stuff.

name: turret mount
description: A rotating, universal mount for a weapon.  If your hands are empty, you can stand next to a turret mount and 'f'ire the weapon by selecting the tile.
